params.name: limit

params.description: This field may be set in order to filter the resources returned.

params.name: cursor
params.description: A page token, received from a previous call, to retrieve a subsequent page.

params.description: Whether to read any items if >= count canâ€™t be read. Default false.

params.name: invisibilityTimeoutSeconds
params.description: Invisibility timeout for items read, default 30s. This will make previously read items invisible for the provided duration in the next Read request.

creatorIsIdVerified.description: Gets ID verification status for a user that has a public talent hub profile.

tags.example: const { data: isIdVerified } = await ClassicTalentApi.creatorIsIdVerified({ userId: 45348281 });

params.name: userId
params.description: The id of the user to get verification info about.

tags.example: const { data: jobSearchData } = await ClassicTalentApi.jobSearch({ query: "simulator", limit: 1, cursor: 1 });

params.name: query
params.description: The query to search for.

params.name: limit
params.description: The maxium amount of items to return.

params.name: filter
params.description: Filter the returned job posts to match specific requirements.

params.name: cursor
params.description: The paging cursor for the previous or next page.

tags.example: const { data: gamesThumbnails } = await ClassicThumbnailsApi.gamesThumbnails({ universeIds: [1685831367] });

params.name: universeIds
params.description: The ids of the universe to get thumbnails for.

params.name: countPerUniverse
params.description: The amount of thumbnails to return for each universe

params.name: defaults
params.description: True if defaults (if any) should be returned if no media exists.

params.name: size
params.description: The thumbnails size (formatted as {width}x{height}).

params.name: format
params.description: Specifies the format of the thumbnails.

params.name: isCircular
params.description: Dictates if the thumbnails should be masked by a circle.

universeIdFromPlaceId.description: Gets the parent universe Id from a place Id.

tags.example: const { data: universeId } = await ClassicUniversesApi.universeIdFromPlaceId({ placeId: 16349154726 });
tags.exampleRawBody: { universeId: 5638577595 }

params.name: placeId
params.description: The id of the place to get the universe id for.

authenticatedUserBirthdate.description: Gets the birthdate for the currently authenticated user.

tags.example: const { data: birthdate } = await ClassicUsersApi.authenticatedUserBirthdate();
tags.exampleRawBody: { birthMonth: 2, birthDay: 3, birthYear: 2005 }

authenticatedUserDescription.description: Gets the description for the currently authenticated user.

tags.example: const { data: description } = await ClassicUsersApi.authenticatedUserDescription();
tags.exampleRawBody: { description: "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipiscing elit." }

authenticatedUserGender.description: Gets the gender for the currently authenticated user.

tags.example: const { data: description } = await ClassicUsersApi.authenticatedUserGender();
tags.exampleRawBody: { gender: 2 }

validateDisplayNameForNewUser.description: Validates a display name for a new user (NOTE: This does not change the display name).

params.name: displayName
params.description: The display name to be validated.

params.name: birthdate
params.description: The birthdate of the new user.

validateDisplayNameForExistingUser.description: Validates a display name for an existing user (NOTE: This does not change the display name).

params.name: displayName
params.description: The display name to be validated.

params.name: userId
params.description: The id of the existing user.

authenticatedUserSetDisplayName.description: Sets the display name for the currently authenticated user.

params.name: newDisplayName
params.description: The new display name for the authenticated user.

params.name: userId
params.description: The id of the currently authenticated user (the endpoint requires this for some reason).

usernamesToUsersInfo.description: Gets information about multiple users from their usernames.

tags.example: const { data: usersInfo } = await ClassicUsersApi.usernamesToUsersInfo({ usernames: ["MightyPart"] });

params.name: usernames
params.description: The usernames of the users to get info about.

params.name: excludeBannedUsers
params.description: Dictates if info about banned users should be excluded from the returned data. (defaults to false).

userIdsToUsersInfo.description: Gets information about multiple users from their ids.

tags.example: const { data: usersInfo } = await ClassicUsersApi.userIdsToUsersInfo({ userIds: [45348281] });

params.name: userIds
params.description: The ids of the users to get info about.

params.name: excludeBannedUsers
params.description: Dictates if info about banned users should be excluded from the returned data. (defaults to false).
